mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM S_CMT WHERE STUD_NO = #{studNo} AND STATE = 1

SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.CMT_NO, A.STUD_NO, A.NICKNAME, A.CMT_CONTENT, A.CREATE_DATE, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, CREATE_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, CMT_NO, STUD_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, IP FROM S_CMT WHERE STUD_NO = #{studNo}) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S_CMT (STUD_NO, NICKNAME, CMT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, IP , GROUP_NO) VALUES (#{studNo}, #{nickname}, #{cmtContent}, NOW(), 1, 0, #{ip}, #{groupNo})
